title.rendered: Data Science Intern at United Airlines, Gurgaon [Python; R; Pyspark; Teradata SQL; Microsoft TSQL]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the Data Science Intern at United Airlines, Gurgaon. Check the eligibility and apply before the link expires!

About United Airlines

United’s Digital Technology team is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining technology solutions that scale massively, powered by innovative architectures, data analytics, and digital solutions.

The company places great emphasis on inclusion, believing it is the key driver of innovation and central to all they do. United’s Shared Purpose, “Connecting people. Uniting the world,” motivates the organization to be the best airline for its employees, customers, and all those they serve. Achieving this vision relies on a truly diverse and inclusive workforce. United’s team is globally diverse, working collaboratively with cutting-edge technology to build the best airline in aviation history.

United offers a supportive work environment with multiple employee-run Business Resource Group communities and world-class benefits such as health insurance, parental leave, and space-available travel. The company fosters a welcoming and inclusive atmosphere, making it a unique place to work. Joining United means contributing to a positive global impact.

Responsibilities

The Analytics and Innovation (Ai) team at United Airlines is dedicated to driving innovation, transformation, and solving complex business challenges, resulting in significant, measurable impacts on the enterprise. This is achieved through a combination of deep cross-functional business expertise and advanced analytics.

The team collaborates with various business and technology partners across the organization, including areas such as Airport Operations, Contact Centers, Network Planning, Revenue Management, Digital Products, and Human Resources, to influence strategic decisions, shape enterprise strategy, streamline business processes, and connect the dots across the company. The goal is to be an organization that fosters a collaborative and enjoyable working environment for all.

Currently, the team is seeking an analytics intern with a passion for data and analytics and a keen interest in delving into the details. The intern will be responsible for translating data findings into actionable insights and recommendations for business stakeholders, as well as contributing to the development of smart, innovative solutions across various United departments.

Key responsibilities include:

  • Executing solutions to business challenges using data analysis, data mining, report generation, and statistical modeling.
  • Creating and developing reports and dashboards for United leadership and external stakeholders.
  • Structuring and effectively communicating insights from workstreams, delivering clear and professional presentations to team members and project managers.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree
  • 3rd / 4th Year Graduate Students
  • (having availability to work on 6-month internship)
  • Must be legally authorized to work in India for any employer without sponsorship
  • Advanced level comfort with Microsoft Office, especially Excel and Powerpoint
  • Ability to manipulate and analyze complex data to highlight patterns and relationships
  • Experience in using database querying tools and able to write queries using Teradata SQL and/or Microsoft TSQL
  • Familiarity with one or more reporting tools – Spotfire / Tableau / Power BI
  • Strong interpersonal skills with a focus on teamwork
  • Must be legally authorized to work in India for any employer without sponsorship
  • Must be fluent in English (written and spoken)
  • Successful completion of interview required to meet job qualification
  • Reliable, punctual attendance is an essential function of the position

Preferred

  • Engineering, Technology, Computer Science, Statistics, Operations Research, Applied Mathematics, Economics
  • Proficiency in Programming Languages (Python / R / Pyspark)

How to Apply?

Interested candidates can directly through this link.

Location

Gurugram, Haryana, India
